messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Your whole atmosphere is shady.
Cooperate in this investigation!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I mistook your toughness as shadiness!
It’s an honest mistake!
messages.TRMSG_NOT_NIGHT_UNUSED:
We’re constantly on patrol.
That way, it’s safe even at night.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Whoa! Hold it right there!
I’ve spotted a sneaky Trainer!
